releases.description:
改动比较多，这次的更新日志就不水了

- 适配 酷狗概念版
- 添加 显示编译时间 
- 添加 部分系统隐藏通知图标 (未测试)
- 修复 Activity重建闪退
- 修复 自定义hook无法恢复默认
- 修复 众多问题
- 优化 代码
---
There are many changes, this time the update log is not watery

- Adapt to Kugou Concept Edition
- Added show compile time
- Added some system hidden notification icons (not tested)
- Fix Activity rebuild crash
- Fix custom hook cannot be restored to default
- Fixed numerous issues
- Optimized code
releases.descriptionHTML:
改动比较多，这次的更新日志就不水了

  • Added show compile time

  • Fix Activity rebuild crash
  • Fix custom hook cannot be restored to default

releases.description:
- 添加 歌词大小动态更新
- 添加 自定义图标动态更新
- 添加 自定义文字
- 修复 歌词动效异常
- 修复 设置歌词位置无效
- 修复 点击切换歌词暂停后依然能点击
- 优化 代码
---
- Added dynamic update of lyrics size
- Add custom icon dynamic update
- Add custom text
- Fix the abnormality of lyrics animation
- Fixed setting lyrics position invalid
- Fix click to switch lyrics can still click after pause
- Optimized code

releases.description:
## 5.0.0
- 重构 核心部分（第二次）
- 增加 延迟加载
- 添加 自定义Toast
- 添加 主页随机提示
- 添加 首次使用提示
- 添加 输入范围判断
- 增加 配置实时动态更新
- 添加 更多appcenter收集信息
- 修复 歌词动画异常
- 修复 图标默认大小异常
- 修复 小米音乐显示异常
- 修复 DataBinding异常
- 修复 自定义字体导致的闪退
- 优化 图标设置
- 优化 代码
- 关闭 主题强制反色
- 移除 伪时间
- 移除 多余功能
- 移除 多余权限
- 移除 谷歌广告
---
- Refactoring the core part (2nd time)
- Added lazy loading
- Add custom Toast
- Added homepage random prompt
- Added first-time usage tips
- Added input range judgment
- Added configuration real-time dynamic update
- Add more appcenter collection information
- Fix the abnormal lyrics animation
- The default size of the blessing icon is abnormal
- Fix Xiaomi music display abnormal
- Fix DataBinding exception
- Fixed crash caused by custom fonts
- Optimized icon settings
- Optimized code
- Turn off theme forcibly invert colors
- remove pseudo time
- Remove redundant features
- Remove redundant permissions
- remove google ads
releases.descriptionHTML:
5.0.0

  • 重构 核心部分（第二次）
  • 增加 延迟加载
  • 添加 自定义Toast
  • 添加 主页随机提示
  • 添加 首次使用提示

  • 修复 小米音乐显示异常
  • 修复 DataBinding异常
  • 修复 自定义字体导致的闪退
  • 优化 图标设置
  • 优化 代码
  • 关闭 主题强制反色
  • 移除 伪时间
  • 移除 多余功能
  • 移除 多余权限
  • 移除 谷歌广告
  • Refactoring the core part (2nd time)
  • Added lazy loading
  • Add custom Toast
  • Added homepage random prompt
  • Added first-time usage tips
  • Added input range judgment
  • Added configuration real-time dynamic update
  • Add more appcenter collection information
  • Fix the abnormal lyrics animation
  • The default size of the blessing icon is abnormal
  • Fix Xiaomi music display abnormal
  • Fix DataBinding exception
  • Fixed crash caused by custom fonts
  • Optimized icon settings
  • Optimized code
  • Turn off theme forcibly invert colors
  • remove pseudo time
  • Remove redundant features
  • Remove redundant permissions
  • remove google ads

releases.description:
## 4.1.3
- 添加 控件添加位置 功能
- 添加 备份 功能
- 添加 公告 功能
- 添加 帮助手册  功能
- 增加 自定义字体  功能
- 添加 部分魔改系统支持 功能
- 添加 歌词间距 功能
- 添加 歌词字体宽度 功能
- 添加 反色时间 功能
- 添加 防烧屏移动时间 功能
- 添加 歌词暂停关闭歌词时间 功能
- 删除 网易云8.0以上人工适配hook
- 优化 布局
- 优化 代码
---
## 4.1.3
- Add control to add location function
- Added backup function
- Add announcement function
- Add help manual function
- Add custom font function
- Added some magic system support functions
- Add Lyric Spacing feature
- Add lyric font width function
- Add inverse color time function
- Add anti-burn screen moving time function
- Add lyrics pause to close lyrics time function
- Delete the manual adaptation hook for NetEase Cloud 8.0 and above
- Optimized layout
- Optimized code

releases.description:
## 3.40.19
- 修复 歌词颜色相关问题
- 修复 仅锁屏显示无法使用

## 3.40.18
- 添加 hook系统界面判断
- 增加 eual
- 修复 反色
- 修复 部分手机无法反色和自定义颜色异常
- 更改 描述

## 3.40.16
- 优化 耗电和CPU占用 
- 适配 网易云极速版
- 修改 为网易云8.0.14以下版本开启传统Hook模式

## 3.38.15
- 优化 代码
- 回撤 状态栏歌词优化

--- 
## 3.40.19
- Fix the problem of lyrics color
- Fix that only the lock screen display cannot be used

## 3.40.18
- Add hook system interface judgment
- Add eual
- Repair inverted colors
- Fixed some mobile phones unable to reverse color and custom color abnormalities
- Change description

## 3.40.16
- Optimize power consumption and CPU usage
- Adapt to NetEase Cloud Extreme Edition
- Modified to enable the traditional hook mode for NetEase Cloud 8.0.14 and below

## 3.38.15
- Optimize the code
- Retracement status bar lyrics optimization

  • 回撤 状态栏歌词优化

  • Fix that only the lock screen display cannot be used

  • Add eual

  • Fixed some mobile phones unable to reverse color and custom color abnormalities
  • Change description

  • Adapt to NetEase Cloud Extreme Edition
  • Modified to enable the traditional hook mode for NetEase Cloud 8.0.14 and below

releases.description:
## 3.34.8
- 修复 旧版网易云无法获取歌词

## 3.34.7
- 修复 咪咕切歌停留上一句歌词
- 修复 网易云闪退

## 3.34.5
- 更好的API
- 修复无法输入 - 号
- 修复 歌词立马滚动的问题
- 修复 SP配置文件的闪退问题
- 移除 SP配置文件歌词统计

## 3.32.3
- 添加 提示
- 修复 日志无法显示
- 修复 描述错误
- 修复 弹窗框无法暗影模式
- 回撤 配置文件
- 优化 布局

## 3.34.8
- Fixed the old version of NetEase Cloud could not get the lyrics

## 3.34.7
- Fix Migu cut the song and stay on the last line of lyrics
- Fix NetEase cloud crash

## 3.34.5
- Better API
- Repair can't input-number
- Fix the problem that the lyrics are scrolling immediately
- Fix the crash issue of SP configuration file
- Remove lyrics statistics of SP profile

## 3.32.3
- Add tips
- Fix the log cannot be displayed
- Fix description error
- Fixed the shadow mode in the pop-up window frame
- Withdrawal profile
- Optimize the layout

墨•状态栏歌词

![Release Download](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/total?style=flat-square) [![Release Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/577fkj/StatusBarLyric?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/releases/latest) [![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/577fkj/StatusBarLyric?style=flat-square)](LICENSE) [![GitHub Star](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/577fkj/StatusBarLyric?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/stargazers) [![GitHub Fork](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/577fkj/StatusBarLyric?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/network/members) ![GitHub Repo size](https://img.shields.io/github/repo-size/577fkj/StatusBarLyric?style=flat-square&color=3cb371) [![GitHub Repo Languages](https://img.shields.io/github/languages/top/577fkj/StatusBarLyric?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/search?l=java) [![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/endpoint.svg?url=https%3A%2F%2Factions-badge.atrox.dev%2F577fkj%2FStatusBarLyric%2Fbadge%3Fref%3Dmain&style=flat)](https://actions-badge.atrox.dev/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/goto?ref=main) [![GitHub Star](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/577fkj/StatusBarLyric.svg?style=social)](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric) [![电报群](https://img.shields.io/badge/电报群-StatusBatLyric-blue.svg?style=flat-square&color=12b7f5)](https://t.me/StatusBatLyric) [![QQ群](https://img.shields.io/badge/QQ群-884185860-blue.svg?style=flat-square&color=12b7f5)](https://qm.qq.com/cgi-bin/qm/qr?k=ea_MP7zFoZJEdpxDFQcadBdbZmwYXZHh&jump_from=webapi) [![爱发电](https://img.shields.io/badge/爱发电-@xiao_wine-blue.svg?style=flat-square&color=12b7f5)](https://afdian.net/@xiao_wine)
### 语言 / Language 简体中文 / [English](https://github.com/Block-Network/StatusBarLyric/blob/Dev/README_EN.md) ### 理论支持 __所有__ 官方系统版本 ## 支持的音乐软件版本 - __请查看模块内的使用说明__ ## 感谢名单（不分先后） - @潇风残月 (感谢提供的库以及对代码的极限精简) - @柒猫Sebun_Neko (感谢提供的图标) - @Yife Playte (感谢帮忙优化矢量图) - @YuKongA - @QQ little ice - @咕灵谷灵咕 （感谢提供flyme获取歌词的技术支持） ## 帮助翻译 [![Crowdin](https://badges.crowdin.net/statusbarlyric/localized.svg)](https://crowdin.com/project/statusbarlyric) [点击进入Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/project/statusbarlyric) ### 下载 - [Releases](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/releases) - [酷安](https://www.coolapk.com/apk/cn.fkj233.xposed.statusbarlyric) - [Beta](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/actions/workflows/Android.yml) - [Canary](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/actions/workflows/Android_Dev.yml) ### 使用教程 [HELP](https://github.com/Block-Network/StatusBarLyric/blob/Dev/doc/HELP.md) ### 联系我们 - [QQ交流群](https://jq.qq.com/?_wv=1027&k=KQeQjgsv) - [电报](https://t.me/StatusBatLyric) - [酷安](https://www.coolapk.com/apk/cn.fkj233.xposed.statusbarlyric) - [BUG反馈(Github)](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarLyric/issues/new) ## 音乐主动适配 请查看 [Api](https://github.com/577fkj/StatusBarApiExample) ## 贡献 [想做贡献？](https://github.com/Block-Network/StatusBarLyric/blob/Dev/doc/CONTRIBUTING.md) [合作名单](https://github.com/Block-Network/StatusBarLyric/blob/Dev/doc/Cooperate.md) [赞助列表](https://github.com/Block-Network/StatusBarLyric/blob/Dev/doc/SPONSOR.md) ## EULA & License [EULA](https://github.com/Block-Network/StatusBarLyric/blob/Dev/doc/EULA.md) [GNU General Public License v3.0](https://github.com/Block-Network/StatusBarLyric/blob/Dev/LICENSE)
